name: crypto-feargreed-mcp
description: Providing real-time and historical Crypto Fear & Greed Index data.

examples.title: Get Current Index
examples.description: What is the current Crypto Fear & Greed Index?
examples.prompt: What's the current Crypto Fear & Greed Index?

examples.title: Analyze Trend
examples.description: Show the Fear & Greed Index trend for a specific number of days.
examples.prompt: Show me the Crypto Fear & Greed Index trend for the last 30 days.
